attributes.action: allow football clubs to introduce terraced areas in their grounds regardless of ground capacity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Terracing was removed from the biggest grounds in 1987 after the Hillsborough disaster, and currently all Premiership and Championship grounds minus the stadia of Cardiff City and Plymouth Argyle football clubs. We the undersigned request that "terracing" areas bound under safe capacity limits be considered to allow lower income persons to attend football matches and improve match attendances.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
